intro_paragraph: This tool helps to determine if Section 899 might apply to your situation based on a series of questions. Follow the flowchart below to assess potential impact.

content.title: Section 899 Applicability Flowchart
content.description: Use this flowchart to navigate the key decision points of Section 899.
content.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    %% Step 1: Check DFC residency of foreign parent/recipient
    A1{"Is foreign parent or recipient a
resident of a DFC?"} -- No --> NC1["Not caught by Section 899"]
    A1 -- Yes --> B1{"Is your US sub >50% owned
(directly or indirectly)
by that DFC entity/group?"}

    %% Step 2: Ownership threshold
    B1 -- No --> NC2["Not caught by Section 899"]
    B1 -- Yes --> C1{"Are you a public company?"}

    %% Step 3: Public company carve‐out check, then proceed to payment/profits tests
    C1 -- Yes --> PublicCheck["Check Treasury guidance for
public-company carve-outs"]
    C1 -- No --> Applicable["“Applicable person” test met;
Section 899 applies"]

    %% Both Yes and No from C1 converge here
    PublicCheck --> D1
    Applicable --> D1

    %% Step 4: US-source payment check
    D1{"Are you making a
US-source payment
(dividend, royalty, interest, etc.)
to an applicable person?"}
    D1 -- Yes --> ApplyWHT["Apply increased WHT via
escalation schedule"]
    D1 -- No --> E1{"Are you earning US business profits
as an applicable person?"}

    %% Step 5: US-business profits check
    E1 -- Yes --> ApplyTax["Apply increased US corporate/individual
tax-rate escalation schedule"]
    E1 -- No --> F1{"Does your structure involve
trusts, partnerships, branches,
or hybrids?"}

    %% Step 6: Anti-avoidance and direct-test
    F1 -- Yes --> CheckRegs["Carefully check if Secretary regs
sweep these in (indirect/anti-avoidance)"]
    F1 -- No --> DirectTest["Use direct entity test"]

    %% (Optional) Terminal notes
    ApplyWHT --> End["End"]
    ApplyTax --> End
    CheckRegs --> End
    DirectTest --> End

    %% Styling (diamonds vs rectangles)
    classDef decision fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px,shape:diamond;
    class A1,B1,C1,D1,E1,F1 decision;
